inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: capillary blood glucose ≥10 mmol/L in 2 or more occasions or having history of treatment for DM

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patients or their attendants giving consent to take part in the study

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patients or their attendants giving consent to take part in the study

notes: The patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes who presents with hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidosis. He has been on insulin since diagnosis and has never been prescribed oral agents.
